note.p: Career: Lecturer in Physiology, University of Cambridge
Medals/Prizes: Royal Medal 1934; Copley Medal 1946; Nobel Prize (Physiology or Medicine) 1932
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1979 vol 25 pp 1-73, plate, by Sir Alan Hodgkin

R V Jones, 'Addendum' in NR 1994 vol 48 p 165
